item.title: Version 0.9.8.5.2
item.description:
Design Updates:

  • Fresh new app icon reflecting our evolving brand identity
  • Improved visual feedback during operations

Performance Enhancements:

  • Answers now stream in real-time with processing state updates
  • Integrated UI callbacks for smoother user experience
  • Resolved rate limiting issues for improved performance

Bug Fixes:

  • Enhanced validation error handling (#136)
  • Added verification for existing enrichments (#272)
  • Implemented UI state feedback system (#259)
  • Fixed rate limiting performance issues (#330)
